inputs.input: averagenumber={ average maximum minimum mode sum } list={ length random remove duplicates reverse } predicate={ integer even odd perfect square }

block-definition.comment: This reporter block rounds a number to the nearest place indicated in the places input. The places input should be integers. Example: round(15.5, 1) will report 16 round (1.78, -1) wil report 1.81

inputs.input: blackred orange yellow green turquoise light blue dark blue light purple dark purple pink black white gray
blackred orange yellow green turquoise light blue dark blue light purple dark purple pink black white gray

input.options: top or bottom right or left

block-definition.translations: pt:cria as variáveis _ _ ca:crea les _ variables _ es:crear las _ variables _ de:erstellen _ var _

block-definition.comment: This block sets the given value (last input) to the variable named with the name givent (var input). It looks for that variable following the scope order 'script' -> 'sprite' -> 'global' (the first match it finds). If that variable does not exist (in any scope) an error happens, stopping their script. You can check it before using the "does var (name) exists?" block.
block-definition.translations: ca:assigna a _ el valor _ es:asignar a _ el valor _ pt:altera _ para _ de:setze var _ auf _
pt:a variável _ existe ca:existeix la variable _ ? es:existe la variable _ ? de:existiert var _ ?

inputs.input: blackred orange yellow green turquoise light blue dark blue light purple dark purple pink black white gray

block-definition.comment: Toggle visibility of specific blocks: - "All" toggles visibility for all blocks. - "Custom" toggles visibility for custom blocks. - "Primitive" toggles visibility for built-in blocks. - Inputting a category number hides blocks within that category (e.g., "5" hides all Control category blocks). - Toggle the predicate to determine whether all scopes must be true for a block to be shown or hidden, or if at least one must be true (Enabled: all must be true, Disabled: at least one must be true).

block-definition.s: reset pen x: %'x' y: %'y' direction: %'direction' color: %'color'

inputs.input: blackred orange yellow green turquoise light blue dark blue light purple dark purple pink black white gray
blackred orange yellow green turquoise light blue dark blue light purple dark purple pink black white gray

block-definition.s: sorted by length of item %'item' of sublist of %'list'

custom-block.s: sorted by length of item %n of sublist of %l

inputs.input: millisecondsmilliseconds seconds minutes hours days years standard
standardmilliseconds seconds minutes hours days years standard

block-definition.comment: Toggle visibility of blocks: - "All" toggles all blocks. - "Custom" toggles specified blocks. - "Primitive" toggles built-in blocks. - Apply the operation to a specific block by ringifying it in the scopes input. - Inputting a category number hides blocks within that category (e.g., "5" hides all Control category blocks).

You had an incorrect input. Look at the help page for instructions.

block-definition.comment: Returns the IP of the user in IPv4 or IPv6.
